Package controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PlayerController
  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the methods for reinforcement, attack and fortification

    Sai Krishna

                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countries,
                                    java.lang.String countryName)
        calculates the reinforcement armies reward continent reward
        Parameters:
        player - player object containing all player information
        continents - hashmap containing continent objects
        countries - hashmap containing countries objects
        countryName - the country for which we need the continents and country object information
        cardReward - the reward army obtained after card exchange
        Returns:
        returns reward armies for continent obtained as integer

      • exchangeCard

        public int exchangeCard​(int num1,
                        int num2,
                        int num3,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> currentCardList,
                        Player player)
        This method will calculate rewarded armies to be obtained after exchanging cards
        Parameters:
        num1 - 1st number selected from card exchange view
        num2 - 2nd number selected from card exchange view
        num3 - 3rd number selected from card exchange view
        currentCardList - is the list of cards in players possession
        player - player object containing all player information
        Returns:
        the method will return number of reward army the player will get after exchanging the cards

                                           int numOfArmiesToPlace,

                                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continents> continents,
                                           Player mp)
        this method will be called when the place reinforcement army command will be given
        Parameters:
        countryName - where the army will be placed
        numOfArmiesToPlace - the armies to be placed will be mentioned in command line
        countries - countries hashmap containing countries objects
        playerMap - player hashmap containing all the player data
        continents - continents hashmap containing continent objects
        mp - is the player object model for the turn
        Returns:
        success or failure messages for each situation

      • fortify

        performs the fortify action uses getCountryNumberByName and getAdjacencyMatrix methods
        Parameters:
        player - player model object containing all player information
        fromCountry - the country from where army will be moved
        toCountry - the country to where army will be moved
        armyToPlace - No. armies to place
        countries - hashmap parsed from map for country list
        boundaries - hashmap for country list for each continent
        Returns:
        appropriate messages for view

      • allOutAttackedPhase

        public java.lang.String allOutAttackedPhase​(java.lang.String attackerCountry,
                                            java.lang.String defenderCountry,
                                            Player attackerPlayerData,
                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countryList,
                                            Player player,
                                            Player defenderPlayerData)
        method performs -all out attack phase
        Parameters:
        attackerCountry - is the name of the attacker country
        defenderCountry - is the name of the defender country
        attackerPlayerData - it contains the data of the attacker
        countryList - contains list of countries
        player - contains the current Player's turn
        defenderPlayerData - it contains defender player data
        Returns:
        won if attacker wins else army having less then 1 for attacker message

      • allOutDefend

        public int allOutDefend​(java.lang.String defenderPlayerName,
                        java.lang.String defenderCountry,
                        java.lang.Integer attackerArmy,
                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Countries> countryList,
                        Player defenderPlayerData,
                        Player player,
                        Player attackerPlayerData,
                        java.lang.String attackerPlayerName,
                        java.lang.String attackerCountryname)
        Method is used to defend the -all out command from attacker
        Parameters:
        defenderPlayerName - is the name of the defender
        defenderCountry - is the name of the defender country name
        attackerArmy - is the number of army left with the attacker
        countryList - is the list of the countries
        defenderPlayerData - is the data of the defender
        player - it contains the current player's turn data
        attackerPlayerData - it contains the attacker player data
        attackerPlayerName - is the name of the attacker
        attackerCountryname - is the name of attacking country
        Returns:
        number of attacker army left

      • comparingDiceToWin

        public int comparingDiceToWin​(Player p,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> defenderArmiesMap,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> attackerArmiesMap,
                              Player attackerPlayerData,
                              Player defenderPlayerData,
                              java.lang.String attackerCountryName,
                              java.lang.String defenderCountryName)
        method is used to compare the dice roll of both attacker and defender
        Parameters:
        p - contains the current player's turn data
        defenderArmiesMap - it contains the defender's list of countries and its armies
        attackerArmiesMap - it contains the attacker's list of countries and its armies
        attackerPlayerData - it contains the attacker's player data
        defenderPlayerData - it contains the defender's player data
        attackerCountryName - is the name of the attacker country name
        defenderCountryName - is the name of the defender country name
        Returns:
        number of attacker army left after dice rolls comparison

        Returns:
